amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: The proceeds arising from the sale of products of the research and extension centers provided for in sections 85-201 and 85-206 shall be applied to the liquidation of the running expenses of the research and extension centers from which they are sold, and all money so accruing shall be credited as coming from the state and be applied as a part or whole payment of any amount which may be appropriated from the funds of the state for the maintenance of such research and extension centers.
